Title: Raazi
Writer: Harinder S. Sikka (based on the book 'Calling Sehmat' by), Meghna Gulzar (screenplay), Bhavani Iyer (screenplay), Meghna Gulzar (dialogue)
Actors: Alia Bhatt, Vicky Kaushal, Rajit Kapoor, Shishir Sharma
Plot: A Kashmiri woman agrees to marry a Pakistani army officer in order to spy on Pakistan during the Indo-Pakistan War of 1971.
